author: Ellie Harrison, Ellie Harrison
title: Big Brother contestant says it was a 'profound experience' re-entering the outside world amid the coronavirus pandemic
description: Reality show participants were initially left in the dark about the spread of the illness
content:
Daniel Glasman, a contestant on the Swedish version of Big Brother, has spoken about what it was like to learn of the coronavirus pandemic while on the reality show.
Glasman left the series last week, having spent 50 days inside Swedens Big Brother house. Wh… [+1708 chars]
